name: cosmoscope
description: NASA Space Apps 2025 - Cosmoscope: Explore ultra-high-resolution NASA imagery

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev" "npm run cantaloupe" "npm run iiif"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run preview" "cd server && npm run start"
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.typecheck: cd client && npm run typecheck && cd ../server && npm run typecheck

author: NASA Space Apps 2025 Team
